desc: Bristol based hair salon providing a plastic free refill Beauty Apothecary service & Botanical hair products. Stocking British made products as well as raw beauty ingredients such as oils, clays & seaweeds.

layout.text:
Raw beauty ingredients, plastic free, local apothecary offering seaweeds clays and more.
Also stocking British botanical haircare products that we have handpicked, tried and tested...and use in our herbalist hair salon.
